title: What were the Halle tennis results?
description: The Terra Wortmann Open continued on Tuesday with many of the world's top stars in action. Jannik Sinner, the No. 1 player in the PIF ATP Rankings, led the way with a victory against qualifier Yannick Hanfmann, while Flavio Cobolli won a three-set thriller against #NextGenATP star Joao Fonseca. View all of Tuesday's Halle results below. Halle

What were the Halle tennis results?

World No. 1 Sinner advances on Tuesday

June 18, 2025

Thomas F. Starke/Getty Images

The 2025 Terra Wortmann Open will be held at Halle's OWL Arena from 16-22 June. By ATP Staff

The Terra Wortmann Open continued on Tuesday with many of the world's top stars in action. Jannik Sinner, the No. 1 player in the PIF ATP Rankings, led the way with a victory against qualifier Yannick Hanfmann, while Flavio Cobolli won a three-set thriller against #NextGenATP star Joao Fonseca.

View all of Tuesday's Halle results below.

Results - Tuesday, 17 June 2025

Men's Singles - Round of 32
[4] Andrey Rublev d [Q] Sebastian Ofner (AUT) 63 64
Flavio Cobolli (ITA) d [WC] Joao Fonseca (BRA) 57 76(3) 76(8)
[1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) d [Q] Yannick Hanfmann (GER) 75 63
Lorenzo Sonego (ITA) d [WC] Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) 63 62
[7] Tomas Machac (CZE) d [LL] Jesper de Jong (NED) 75 36 63
Denis Shapovalov (CAN) d [6] Ugo Humbert (FRA) 64 46 76(4)
Felix Auger-Aliassime (CAN) d [Q] Laslo Djere (SRB) 63 67(6) 61
Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG) d Pedro Martinez (ESP) 61 63
Alex Michelsen (USA) d [5] Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) 26 75 64

Men's Doubles - Round of 16
[2] Simone Bolelli (ITA)/Andrea Vavassori (ITA) d Marcelo Melo (BRA)/Alexander Zverev (GER) 76(4) 75
[4] Sadio Doumbia (FRA)/Fabien Reboul (FRA) d Daniil Medvedev/Andrey Rublev 67(3) 76(5) 11-9
[Q] Francisco Cabral (POR)/Lucas Miedler (AUT) d [WC] Joao Fonseca (BRA)/Petros Tsitsipas (GRE) 64 64
[3] Christian Harrison (USA)/Evan King (USA) d Maximo Gonzalez (ARG)/Andres Molteni (ARG) 76(7) 76(4)
